Our Projects

Driving innovation and impact through programs that empower young students with technology education.

Digital Literacy

Code For Kids

Code For Kids reaches over 2,000 primary school students annually. Our curriculum is designed by educators and industry experts to make coding accessible and exciting. Students build games, animations, and simple apps while developing problem-solving skills.

15schools
2,000+students
Ongoingduration
Infrastructure

Mobile Lab Initiative

Our Mobile Lab Initiative brings technology directly to underserved communities. We've deployed 12 mobile labs that rotate between 40+ schools, ensuring students in remote areas get hands-on computer experience. Each lab is equipped with educational software and internet connectivity.

40schools
3,500+students
Since 2020duration
Innovation

STEM Workshops

Our STEM Workshops run every quarter, bringing together 200+ high school students for intensive 2-day sessions. Participants build robots, design circuits, and collaborate on real-world challenges. Many alumni have pursued STEM degrees at university.

25schools
800+students
Quarterlyduration
Innovation

Young Innovators Bootcamp

The Young Innovators Bootcamp transforms students into budding entrepreneurs. Over two weeks, participants learn design thinking, prototype development, and business basics. The program culminates in a Demo Day where top teams present to angel investors.

10schools
150students
Annualduration
Capacity Building

Teacher Tech Training

We believe teachers are the key to sustainable impact. Our training programs have upskilled 500+ educators in digital tools, coding pedagogy, and blended learning. Participants receive certification and join our community of tech-savvy educators.

50schools
500+teachers
Ongoingduration

Empowering the next generation of innovators through technology education and school-based initiatives since 2014.
